name: Evil Spirits At Haunted House
description:
Are you ready? to help Mr peter to save his daughter from the control of evil spirits. It is said that Mr peter moved into this haunted house with his wife and daughter, after their shift into this house they notice some paranormal events and one day they attacked to his daughter and demand Mr peter to work for them by collecting pieces of map from holly tree and in this way he can save his daughter.

Be careful while helping him because evil spirits always behind him and they can attack him at any time
